items.description: Display a presentation progress bar

items.description: Display the page number of the current slide

items.title: History
items.description: Push each slide change to the browser history

items.title: keyboard
items.description: Enable keyboard shortcuts for navigation

items.title: Overview
items.description: Enable the slide overview mode

items.title: Center
items.description: Vertical centering of slides

items.title: Touch
items.description: Enables touch navigation on devices with touch input

items.title: Loop
items.description: Loop the presentation

items.title: RTL
items.description: Change the presentation direction to be RTL

items.title: Shuffle
items.description: Randomizes the order of slides each time the presentation loads

items.title: Fragments
items.description: Turns fragments on and off globally

items.title: Embedded
items.description:
Flags if the presentation is running in an embedded mode,
i.e. contained within a limited portion of the screen

items.title: Help
items.description: Flags if we should show a help overlay when the questionmark, key is pressed

items.title: Auto Slide Stoppable
items.description: Stop auto-sliding after user input

items.title: Auto Slide Method
items.description: Use this method for navigation when auto-sliding

items.title: Mouse Wheel
items.description: Enable slide navigation via mouse wheel

items.title: Background Transition
items.description: Transition style for full page slide backgrounds

items.title: View Distance
items.description: Number of slides away from the current that are visible
